item.title: RxJava Observable to Single
item.description: Transforming Single to Observable is simple, as Single satisfies Observable’s contract. Just call single.toObservable() and you’re good. But transforming Observable to Single is not that simple: if it happens that Observable emits exactly one value and completes (or terminates with error without emitting values) then it is pretty straightforward, otherwise one need to set up some additional rules.
